00042 
00043 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_MDS
00044 
00045 #include <linux/module.h>
00046 #include <lustre_ver.h>
00047 #include "mdd_internal.h"
00048 
00049 void mdd_write_lock(const struct lu_env *env, struct mdd_object *obj,
00050                     enum mdd_object_role role)
00051 {
00052         struct dt_object *next = mdd_object_child(obj);
00053 
00054         dt_write_lock(env, next, role);
00055 }
00056 
00057 void mdd_read_lock(const struct lu_env *env, struct mdd_object *obj,
00058                    enum mdd_object_role role)
00059 {
00060         struct dt_object *next = mdd_object_child(obj);
00061 
00062         dt_read_lock(env, next, role);
00063 }
00064 
00065 void mdd_write_unlock(const struct lu_env *env, struct mdd_object *obj)
00066 {
00067         struct dt_object *next = mdd_object_child(obj);
00068 
00069         dt_write_unlock(env, next);
00070 }
00071 
00072 void mdd_read_unlock(const struct lu_env *env, struct mdd_object *obj)
00073 {
00074         struct dt_object *next = mdd_object_child(obj);
00075 
00076         dt_read_unlock(env, next);
00077 }
00078 
00079 int mdd_write_locked(const struct lu_env *env, struct mdd_object *obj)
00080 {
00081         struct dt_object *next = mdd_object_child(obj);
00082 
00083         return dt_write_locked(env, next);
00084 }
